## PopulatableBitcoinsMoneyp.borrowBPD() method

Adjust existing Vault by borrowing more BPD.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
borrowBPD(amount: Decimalish, maxBorrowingRate?: Decimalish, overrides?: BitcoinsTransactionOverrides): Promise<PopulatedBitcoinsMoneypTransaction<VaultAdjustmentDetails>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  amount | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | The amount of BPD to borrow. |
|  maxBorrowingRate | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | Maximum acceptable [borrowing rate](./lib-base.fees.borrowingrate.md)<!-- -->. |
|  overrides | [BitcoinsTransactionOverrides](./lib-ethers.bitcoinstransactionoverrides.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[PopulatedBitcoinsMoneypTransaction](./lib-ethers.populatedbitcoinsmoneyptransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;[VaultAdjustmentDetails](./lib-base.vaultadjustmentdetails.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;

## Remarks

Equivalent to:

```typescript
adjustVault({ borrowBPD: amount }, maxBorrowingRate)

```
